channel.title: Aragon DAO / MESG Integration: Milestone 1
channel.description:
We've just reached the first milestone of the MESG integration with Aragon DAOs, while also starting the first iteration of our testnet running on Tendermint.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/aragon-dao-integration/
